posts.post_content:
Two really awesome cards for sale here. The colors on the Chase are some of the nicest I've ever seen, but the corners obviously hold the grade down. But I'm telling you this Chase is a real stunner! The second is another absolute beauty that I just bought from a great fellow board member and the only reason I'm selling it is to help pay for my Cy Young auto that I have wanted for a long time. Payment is through PayPal-friends and family please. The prices are:

Chase-SOLD
McBride-NLFS

Thanks for looking.

Joe K

Prices lowered one last time. Thanks for the inquiries!! :)
One last bump for these two. :)
One last shot and crazy price reduction!!! :)

No takers on this? I thought signed T206's were a big deal, but unfortunately I guess I was wrong. I paid a lot more than my buy price, that's why I can't go lower than this. Thanks for all the inquiries and this really will be my last bump. :)
